title: Poppy Selection Quote
body:
Okay so basically, whenever I select {{champion:78}} Poppy in Champ Select, her old selection quote ('Valoran will know harmony') is played instead of her new one ('I'm not hero, just a Yordle with a hammer'). I'm assuming this is just an oversight, but it's jarring enough that I thought I should mention it. I sent in a support ticket, and they recommended I post it on the Bug report board. Seeing as for whatever reason I can't post on those boards, I thought I'd post it here.

It's a really minor thing, but like I said, I thought I should at least mention it.

replies.body:
Yup, Rito is aware. No ETA on a fix.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/PQlya93v-valoran-will-know-harmony-new-poppy?comment=0000
